ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] More than 6 in a group?
ygData.msgSnippet: For the record, there was a system message this evening officially declairing the use of this bug an exploit warrenting immediate suspension. Just so you know.
ygData.messageBody:
For the record, there was a system message this evening officially
declairing the use of this bug an exploit warrenting immediate suspension.

Just so you know.




----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <EMEEKER@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 10:41 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] More than 6 in a group?


> I juuust have to say, 6+ member groups is an exploit. The use of exploits
> fundamentally chnges the game experience for yourself and others and
brings
> on more and more restrictive coding that very often negativly affects
other
> "freedom"s in the game. I will not participate in a seven member group, I
> leave, and petition them. Using exploits is irresponsible and selfish I
> happily petition whenever and wherever I see them being used..
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin, Povar
>
>
>
>
